trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Liverpool
There were no other sightings in Liverpool on or around June 20th 2010
Summary: High in the sky in formation about 14 objects star like moving.
divs: sighting detailson sunday 20th june it was a very sunny day and all my family and i were in the garden in prestatyn north wales enjoying fathers day when my dad noticed what looked like a balloon drifting in the sky then we noticed high above that to the right of it what looked like stars round in shape and silver\white across the sky they were in formation 3 in a row up front then 6 in a hextaginal shape behind then differant position behind that very hard to explain in words but they did not move from their positions as they moved across the sky we carried on watching until they were out of sight. we just looked at each other in be-wilderment as to what we had just seen. i trid to take a phjoto but they were to high and with the sky so blue it would not show them.we have checked local news\ internet but nothing has been reported, 4 days later and we are still talking about it. i hope somebody else sore it.
